ygData.subject: Re: Monk Creation / Stats
ygData.msgSnippet: You want an advantage?  Tell him you will duel him nude.  Hehe, I did this before a while ago.  I told the person (I think he was an warrior/ranger/paladin, I
ygData.messageBody:
You want an advantage? Tell him you will duel him nude. Hehe, I did this
before a while ago. I told the person (I think he was an
warrior/ranger/paladin, I cant remember exactly it was a while ago) and I
told him I would fight him, directly after we both suicided by attacking a
high level guard, and then not looting our corpse. Of course he had no idea
that monks pretty much repop combat ready, he figured it would be two
unarmored, unarmed people relying on skills like kick to do damage. So
while he was hitting me for 4 and 5 points, and his kicks were doing like
10-12, my punches were landing for 10-12 points, and my tiger claw was
getting him for 9-11 each time. needless to say the imbalance in hitpoints
didn't matter much, it wasn't long before he dropped.

Shelza, 17th, Karana.


>From: kito1st <kito1st@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Monk Creation / Stats
>Date: Wed, 02 Feb 2000 01:02:05 -1000
>
> I have a question that hasn't been addressed, at least as long as I have
>been reading this board.
> I have been challenged to a duel by a 23 Paladin as soon as I hit his lvl
>(I'm currently at 22) and wondered if there are any hints/strategies to
>dueling as a monk that might help. I haven't dueled since lvl 5 and have no
>idea what to do to give myself any kind of advantage. He is a bit tweeked
>whereas I am not so that will give him even more of an advantage of course,
>but I believe I still have a chance......anything anyone can think of that
>might help me out? I would REALLY appreciate any help on this esp. since I
>have to work with this guy every day.
> I have a little more of a desire to beat him since he just happens to be
>my
>supervisor, too!!! :)
>
>I thank you all in advance for your input.
>
>Kaldon of Povar
>
